description: This file defines a class GiphyTools that provides functionality to search for GIFs using the Giphy API. It includes methods for initializing the tool with API credentials and limits, and for performing GIF searches, returning URLs of found GIFs and adding images to an agent or team.

classes.name: GiphyTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for searching GIFs via the Giphy API, extending the Toolkit base class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the GiphyTools with optional API key, limit, and additional keyword arguments. Sets up the search_gifs method as a tool.

methods.name: search_gifs
methods.description: Performs a search for GIFs based on a query string, retrieves URLs, and adds images to the agent or team.
